general.name: Joule losses
general.description: Heat generated by Joule losses in magnetic field

vector.planar: - gamma * (2 * PI * f) * (2 * PI * f) * (mur * MU0) * (mur * MU0) * (source0 * source0 + source1 * source1) * vval
vector.axi: - gamma * (2 * PI * f) * (2 * PI * f) * (mur * MU0) * (mur * MU0) * (source0 * source0 + source1 * source1) * r * vval

matrix.planar: gamma * (2 * PI * f) * (2 * PI * f) * (mur * MU0) * (mur * MU0) * (uval * uval) * vval
matrix.axi: gamma * (2 * PI * f) * (2 * PI * f) * (mur * MU0) * (mur * MU0) * (uval * uval) * r * vval

matrix.planar: gamma * (2 * PI * f) * (2 * PI * f) * (mur * MU0) * (mur * MU0) * (udx * udx + udy * udy) * vval
matrix.axi: gamma * (2 * PI * f) * (2 * PI * f) * (mur * MU0) * (mur * MU0) * (udr * udr + udz * udz) * r * vval

vector.planar: - gamma * (2 * PI * f) * (2 * PI * f) * (mur * MU0) * (mur * MU0) * (upval * upval) * vval
vector.axi: - gamma * (2 * PI * f) * (2 * PI * f) * (mur * MU0) * (mur * MU0) * (upval * upval) * r * vval

vector.axi: - gamma * (2 * PI * f) * (2 * PI * f) * (mur * MU0) * (mur * MU0) * (upval * upval) * r * vval

vector.axi: - gamma * (2 * PI * f) * (2 * PI * f) * (mur * MU0) * (mur * MU0) * (source0 * source0 + source1 * source1) * r * vval

matrix.axi: gamma * (2 * PI * f) * (2 * PI * f) * (mur * MU0) * (mur * MU0) * (uval * uval) * r * vval
